overview: From 2025-05-29 to 2025-05-30, elizaos/eliza had 10 new PRs (3 merged), 1 new issues, and 13 active contributors.

topIssues.title: plugin-evm Fails to Load
topIssues.author: omariosman
topIssues.body:
Any idea on how to create an eliza AI agent that is able to perform evm operations on behalf me?

# Description

The `@elizaos-plugins/plugin-evm` plugin fails to load in ElizaOS due to a missing `@elizaos/plugin-tee` dependency, despite being installed correctly per the ElizaOS documentation.

# Error
```
Failed to import plugin: @elizaos-plugins/plugin-evm Error: Cannot find package '/home/omarosman23/Documents/learn/ai-agents/eliza/packages/plugin-evm/node_modules/@elizaos/plugin-tee/' imported from /home/omarosman23/Documents/learn/ai-agents/eliza/packages/plugin-evm/dist/index.js
```

# Steps to Reproduce

## Installation
Installed plugin: `npx elizaos plugins add @elizaos-plugins/plugin-evm` and verified plugin in `packages/plugin-evm`



## Configured .env:
```
EVM_PRIVATE_KEY=0x<redacted>
EVM_PROVIDER_URL=<my-rpc-url>
```


## Updated character.json:
```
{
  "name": "Eliza",
  "plugins": ["@elizaos-plugins/plugin-evm"],
  "modelProvider": "openrouter",
  "settings": { "chains": { "evm": ["baseSepolia"] } }
}
```


## Run agent: 
`pnpm start --characters="characters/example-character.json"`

## Expected Behavior

Plugin should load and enable EVM actions (e.g., send ETH, check balance).

## Actual Behavior

Plugin fails to load due to missing `@elizaos/plugin-tee dependency`
I installed `@elizaos/plugin-tee dependency` but the same issue presists

## Environment
```
Node.js: v23.3.0
pnpm: v8.14.3
ElizaOS: 0.25.9
OS: Ubuntu 22.04
```


Any idea on how to create an eliza AI agent that is able to perform evm operations on behalf me?

topPRs.title: docs: comprehensive CLI docs standardization, updates, and accuracy fixes
topPRs.author: yungalgo
topPRs.body:
**Problem:**

CLI documentation across all commands contained critical inaccuracies and inconsistencies:
Command descriptions didn't match actual CLI help output
Incorrect aliases and missing options throughout
Non-existent commands referenced in quickstart guide
Inconsistent formatting and missing comprehensive examples
Command ordering didn't match CLI structure
JSON examples used unprofessional notation ("etc...")

**Solution:**

Systematically verified and standardized ALL CLI documentation against actual CLI help output:
âœ… CLI Verification: Retrieved help output for every command and subcommand
âœ… Complete Accuracy: All descriptions, options, and aliases now match CLI exactly
âœ… Comprehensive Examples: Added detailed usage examples with realistic names
âœ… Consistent Structure: Applied standardized format across all command docs
âœ… Professional Standards: Fixed JSON notation and technical documentation standards

**Details:**

14 files updated with 2,122+ additions, 1,309 deletions
Command Order: Fixed overview.md to match exact CLI help order

Critical Fixes:
Test command: -n, --name <name> â†’ -n, --name <n> (matches CLI)
Plugins: Fixed incorrect aliases (remove|delete â†’ remove|delete)
Agent: All subcommands and options now accurate
Publish: Added registry guidance and continuous development workflow
Removed Invalid Commands: Cleaned up quickstart.md references to non-existent commands
Enhanced UX: Added comprehensive troubleshooting and workflow guidance

**Validation Method:**

Every command change verified against elizaos [command] --help output to ensure 100% accuracy.

**Impact:**

ðŸŽ¯ Perfect CLI Alignment: Documentation now matches CLI behavior exactly
ðŸ“š Professional Quality: Comprehensive examples and troubleshooting
ðŸ”§ Developer Experience: Accurate guidance reduces confusion and support burden
ðŸš€ User Onboarding: Quickstart guide now works seamlessly

topPRs.title: feat: added ai model prompts while creating a new agent via CLI
topPRs.author: samarth30
topPRs.body:
# Background

## What does this PR do?

## What kind of change is this?
This pull request introduces support for AI model selection and configuration during project creation, along with code improvements for readability and functionality. The most significant changes include adding methods for handling OpenAI and Claude API keys, implementing AI model selection logic, and improving code clarity in the `create` command.

### AI Model Support:

* Added `getAvailableAIModels` function to provide AI model options for selection during project creation. Models include Local AI, OpenAI (ChatGPT), and Claude (Anthropic). (`packages/cli/src/commands/create.ts`, [packages/cli/src/commands/create.tsR61-R210](diffhunk://#diff-a936a0a4f15747f40db2f747d596dad0257164fc8a06ed99d7bc450881b2d47bR61-R210))
* Implemented `setupAIModelConfig` function to configure selected AI models in the `.env` file, supporting both interactive and non-interactive modes. (`packages/cli/src/commands/create.ts`, [packages/cli/src/commands/create.tsR61-R210](diffhunk://#diff-a936a0a4f15747f40db2f747d596dad0257164fc8a06ed99d7bc450881b2d47bR61-R210))
* Integrated AI model selection and configuration into the `create` command workflow, including validation and error handling for missing selections. (`packages/cli/src/commands/create.ts`, [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-a936a0a4f15747f40db2f747d596dad0257164fc8a06ed99d7bc450881b2d47bR565-R587) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-a936a0a4f15747f40db2f747d596dad0257164fc8a06ed99d7bc450881b2d47bL428-R611)

### API Key Handling:

* Added utility methods `isValidOpenAIKey`, `isValidAnthropicKey`, `storeOpenAIKey`, and `storeClaudeKey` for validating and storing API keys in the `.env` file. (`packages/cli/src/utils/get-config.ts`, [packages/cli/src/utils/get-config.tsR425-R576](diffhunk://#diff-315caaf69f0cd63cf85b86102e02c5a36dc1172af0a91ff829fa35f256d25dddR425-R576))
* Implemented `promptAndStoreOpenAIKey` and `promptAndStoreClaudeKey` functions to interactively prompt users for API keys, validate them, and save them. (`packages/cli/src/utils/get-config.ts`, [packages/cli/src/utils/get-config.tsR425-R576](diffhunk://#diff-315caaf69f0cd63cf85b86102e02c5a36dc1172af0a91ff829fa35f256d25dddR425-R576))


https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/86657705-27e5-40d2-8766-be661eddd40f



<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
  - Added the ability to select and configure AI models (local, OpenAI, Claude) during project creation in the CLI, including interactive prompts and environment variable setup.
  - Introduced support for managing OpenAI and Claude API keys, with validation, user prompts, and secure storage in the projectâ€™s environment settings.

- **Refactor**
  - Improved project creation flow for clearer prompts and default selections.
  - Enhanced logging and streamlined directory checks for better user feedback.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
